name: Colored Realities
description:
You are lost in an illusion and need to break out! Do you have what it takes to complete this simple platformer?

Game Jam Theme: Illusion

Game Jam Limitation: There is only one character

Music: Memories by https://www.bensound.com/

Sound: dustyroom.com

Created: 1-3rd of October for the Mini Jam 90: Illusion
